Sobre nosotros Since 1979, we at Herb Pharm have integrated traditional herbal knowledge with modern herbal science to produce superior quality herb products. We are the best selling liquid herbal extract line in America's natural product stores. This is a result of our in-house scientific research and development of our herbal products, our meticulous quality control, our dedication to effective to and environmental issues, and our attention to customer service. We are very proud of our strong history in the herb business and remain dedicated to the continued support of our customers' health with quality herbal products for many years to come. The Herb Pharm family has grown slowly over the years, from just a few helpers to a staff of 100+ employees today. We are proud of the fact that many of our employees have been here over 10 years, some even longer.
